content: Design system is complete and ready for review. All components follow the established guidelines.
Wireframes approved by stakeholders. Moving to visual design phase.
Development environment is 80% complete. Working on final build configurations.
Content migration complete, pending final SEO review before approval.
Market research shows strong demand for booking features. Updating requirements doc.
Social media strategy approved by marketing team. Ready to implement campaigns.
Email templates designed and tested across major email clients. Looking good!
OAuth integration complete. Working on two-factor authentication implementation.
